rows.label: tev025501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ada about Hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ada if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0001
rows.name:
I think of Hope like a big sister. I mean, not that she's
older than me—not by a long shot. Ha! I wish...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0002
rows.name:
But before I knew it, I was going to her with concerns
that I couldn't share with my colleagues or boyfriend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0003
rows.name:
And she never judges, which is amazing—especially
considering some of the stupid crap I've laid on her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ever since we started our journey on the White Whale,
she's been a pillar of strength for all of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0005
rows.name:
But it's bound to end at some point. No one can keep
up that Little Miss Helper act for too long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Well, right now my mind is always on my live-in
boyfriend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0009
rows.name:
He's a BLADE, so you never know what might happen
when he goes out into the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, don't look at me like that! You think I've gone
soft just because I'm worried about the person I love?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Listen, when we finally find the Lifehold Core,
we're going to start new lives here on Mira, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0012
rows.name:
So thinking about fighting all the time is pointless.
It's love that will forge the future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Ada about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0013
rows.name:
I can tell poor Hope has been down in the dumps
ever since that business with Ornella.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0014
rows.name:
I mean, not that I can blame her. Nothing hurts more
than getting shafted by someone you trust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0015
rows.name:
But this isn't just sadness or anger. It's more like...
Well, it's hard to say. Hell, you know how complex of
a person she is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0016
rows.name:
I wish there was something I could do for her.
Goodness knows she's always there for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Ada about the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Ada about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0017
rows.name:
I looked into the people that traitor Ornella was
connected with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0018
rows.name:
It sounds like more of those shape-shifter freaks may
have managed to infiltrate New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Can you imagine? Any one of us could be an
alien in disguise right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0020
rows.name:
It's bad enough the Ganglion have all those horrible
weapons—they don't need to wage psychological war
on us as well![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0023
rows.name:
You remember when we all went looking for that diary
for Hope? Well, I ended up making loads of friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0024
rows.name:
It turned out everyone on the search had a Hope story.
She's done good things for so many people![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0025
rows.name:
Once we got to talking about her, we hit it off like
one big happy family. Folks as nice as Hope really
bring out the best in you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Even that grump Quentin—okay, so I REALLY don't
like Quentin. But even he went on and on about Hope
like she was some kind of saint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025501_MSG0027
rows.name:
He seemed really touched by what she did for him.
For a split second, I could have sworn the guy actually
had a heart.[ST:wait ]
